text:
Windsor Circle | Durham, NC | Senior Software Engineer

We're looking for Python experts to come in and help us build out our platform. Work will involve designing and implementing frameworks for aquiring, transforming and displaying ecommerce data for marketing purposes.

You can see official postings here: http://www.windsorcircle.com/jobs/job-openings or email me at ben.mccormick@windsorcircle.com
